titles: The belman of London Bringing to light the most notorious villanies that are now practised in the kingdome. Profitable for gentlemen, lawyers, merchants, citizens, farmers, masters of housholdes, and all sorts of seruants to mark, and delightfull for all men to reade.
author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Crime --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
Criminals --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
